articles.title: Record outbreak of Dengue fever in Central and South America - BBC.com
articles.description: More than 12.6m cases were recorded this year, the region's UN health organisation says.
articles.content:
The number of cases of dengue fever in Central and South America has nearly tripled to a record high this year, the Pan American Health Organisation (Paho) said on Tuesday.
More than 12.6m cases and… [+1679 chars]
